Introduction

Welcome to the Customize help. This help covers the configuration of the following CareSuite applications:

l Anesthesia Manager

l PACU Manager

l Critical Care Manager

l Preop Manager

For Anesthesia Manager, PACU Manager and Critical Care Manager a patient’s chart is based on the “template” selected at the start of the session. Customize allows you to configure templates to support the practices of individual departments or caregivers. In addition to template configuration, Customize allows you to configure Preop Manager and to set workstation features that are independent of the template in use.

If you are upgrading to version 7.2 Second Edition from a previous version, refer to the Upgrade Guide.
